nodes.text: The Church of the Ganthic Enlightenment was a religious organization that was active during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Eeth Koth, a former Jedi Master, served as a priest in the church, and as such officiated weddings and funerals, and stated to bring people peace. Eventually, however, Darth Vader, Sith apprentice to Emperor Darth Sidious, discovered Koth and killed him in a lightsaber duel.
The Church of the Ganthic Enlightment first appeared in Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 19, a 2017 canon comic written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
